Description:
Why build when you can move in right away
Beautifully presented, light bright and lovingly cared for this Simonds home is the best for family living, with 4 generous bedrooms, front master bedroom with walk-in robe and full en-suite with double vanities, family bathroom plus a theatre or second living room. Large open plan kitchen with walk-in pantry, 900mm range cooker and dishwasher and family meals and dining area with slide stacking doors opening to the rear of the property. Other Features include:
- High ceilings
- Stone benches
- Timber floors
- Double lockup garage with Internal access
- Ducted heating
- Evaporative Cooling
Sensational location close to Clyde Recreation Reserve, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Football Ground, St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School and public transport.
Insights: 12 Lancelot Avenue, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED LAND AVAILABLE NOW!
Titled and ready to build!
14m x 28m
This perfect rectangular 392sqm2 (approx) block is perfect for the investor or first home buyer to build your dream house in the sought after estate of "Eliston".
Only a short walk will take you to beautiful parks, playgrounds, Clyde recreation centre, walking/bike tracks and proposed primary school.
Just a short distance to Willandra Rise & Clyde primary school, Clyde & Selandra Rise shopping centre, Cranbourne Park shopping centre, St. Peters College and childcare.
Located closely to recreational and sporting facilities such as Casey Race, Cranbourne Racecourse, Casey Fields Tennis Courts.
For more information contact Liza Hickey - 0481 185 038

Description:
Stylish, Elegant & Modern
Pristine, polished and generously proportioned , this 2 years old family home situated in the boutique and established Pasadena Estate within walking distance to Shopping On Clyde , Casey Medical Centre, minutes to Casey Fields Sports Grounds, Casey Race Swimming Pool and Clyde Primary School.
This home is immaculately presented and offers high quality living with all the modern day conveniences at your fingertips, featuring;
- 4 great sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Spacious living areas
- LED lights throughout the house
- Floor boards
- Ducted heating & Evaporative cooling
- CCTV camera system
- Security Alarm system
- Video doorbell / Intercom
- A separate salon/study/office ideal for those who enjoy the convenience of working from home
- High ceilings
- Shower heads with ceiling arms
Making good use of the entire allotment, the side yard features a complete enclosed alfresco entertaining area and also a fully fenced secure backyard. Situated close proximity to all local amenities this home offers its new owners a world of opportunity. Dont miss out the opportunity!
ONLY one thing left to do

Description:
Large lot to build your dream home !
Large block of land in pretigious and highly sought after Edgebrook Estate. Build your dream family home with beautiful natural surroundings including a creek that cuts through the estate. Clyde in South East Melbourne is a fast growing & thriving suburb. Included by the developer are -
house front landscaping, fencing and letterbox.
Amenities are just a short drive away. Located conveniently to nearby schools Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College,Casey Grammar & Cranbourne Primary school, medical centers, parks and playgrounds.
A short drive to Monash Highway and will take you to Melbourne CBD that is only 55km away.

Description:
Grand home at an affordable price
This near new 3 bedrooms plus study, 2 bathroom and 2 garage home is just waiting for someone to call it home!
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in robe and ensuite with twin vanities. The second bedroom also comes with a walk-in robe and third bedroom with ample cupboard space of built in double robes.
This home is ideal for the growing family with multiple living zones. As you walk through this beautiful home you are pleasantly surprised with the open plan and its neutral colour tones. The open plan modern kitchen comes with;
Stainless steel appliances
Dishwasher
Pendent lights
900ml appliances
Canopy range hood
Glass splash back
Built in wine shelf
Loads of bench space
The meals and family room overlooking the alfresco area combining outdoor living with indoor.
The added features to this home are;
Ducted heating
Floorboards and carpet
Low maintenance garden
Window blinds
Undercover entraining area
All rooms with plenty of natural light
Still under builders warranty
This property is in the new estate of Belmond on Clyde, located in a quiet neighbourhood with local primary & secondary schools, shopping centres and public transport and much more.
*Please note virtual staging pictures are for illustration purpose only*
ONLY one thing left to do

Description:
Striking Beauty Home or Invest
Situated in the prestigious & tranquil Belmond on Clyde Estate, we are proud to introduce this young family home that offers great features, contemporary design & street appeal, you'll also love all the abundance of facilities at your fingertips.
The residence itself has been meticulously maintained and is a worthy home or astute investment for the future. Offering a wonderful layout combining multiple indoor and outdoor living areas, with 4 genuine bedrooms including master suite with walk in robe, ensuite featuring twin vanities, plus a main bathroom. Completed with a stunning chefs kitchen finished with all upgraded appliances, caesar-stone benches and a walk-in pantry. Outside is highlighted by manicured low maintained gardens both front and rear providing easy maintenance, double remote garage with internal access.
Perfectly positioned amongst other quality homes and within minutes to the bus stop, Casey Fields, Casey Race with Clyde Primary, St Thomas the Apostle Primary and St Peters Collage Secondary all within moments away. Conveniently located within minutes to both Shopping on Clyde & Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre with Cranbourne station only a short distance away. Handy proximity to South Gippsland Highway providing quick access to the South East and Mornington corridor.
To ensure you don't miss out on this amazing opportunity please make sure you inspect!

Description:
NEST OR INVEST!
Just 1 year old in the blossoming Belmond on Clyde' estate with great parks and walking tracks, this fantastic Simonds Home will delight first home buyers downsizers and investors alike.
Comprising: 3 good sized robed bedrooms as well as 2 stylish bathrooms including a full ensuite in the main bedroom. The widened hallway leads to a spacious open plan living area with the fully appointed galley style kitchen stylishly finished with subway tiling, 900mm cooking and dishwasher complete with a large walk in pantry with fridge cavity. Ducted heating and a remote double garage with internal access complete the picture to this awesome home.
With Casey Fields and local shops with schools, buses and central Cranbourne all just minutes away you best be quick on this one!
Internal area
139.35m²

Description:
Ideal Brand New First Home in Clyde North!!
If you are looking to move into a brand new home as your first home (Eligible First Home Buyers Grant TAB) in the prestigious clyde north estate, look no further this superb home package with lots of high quality inclusions and under construction now. It is also a golden opportunity for the astute investors for their maximum return out of their investment as it will be a new home with higher depreciation returns.
This brand new home package features 4 bedrooms plus study, 2 bathrooms, master bedroom with full ensuite and other bedrooms with BIR. There is an open plan living area adjoining the quality modern kitchen with stone bench top, 900 mm stainless steel appliances, gas cook top, under bench oven and range hood and a dishwasher. The additional features include double lockup garage with remote access, ducted heating throughout and many more features. Located in a prestigious clyde north estate and close all the day to day living amenities this opportunity won't last long!! To organise private inspections please contact Dr. Bhimsen Kururukundi on 0407 799 048.
Pictures are for illustration purposes only.

Description:
!!! IDEAL Investment for your Growing Family !!!!
Wise Group Narre Warren presents to you this brand-new gem in the heart of Clyde. Built to high standards, this is where you would want to invest in your first home.
Feel the warmth of this contemporary & luxurious home with its high ceilings, accommodating floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere. The focal point of this residence is its open plan informal living, dining and kitchen space, which works together effortlessly. You will not only be investing in this distinguished location, but also a flawless, and pristine design.
The kitchen becomes the masterpiece of the home, with stainless steel cooktop, oven, dishwasher, stone bench tops and ample storage space for a modern family, on top of all if that your life is made much easier with a walk in pantry with heaps of space and more to spare!
This home is brimming with features, including:
- 4 beds with built in robes plus the third bedroom that comes with double doors so can be used as a theatre.
- Master featuring a walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, ceaserstone benchtop, and large shower
- The modern kitchen features a 40mm caesarstone island benchtop, 900mm upright cooker and oven, dishwasher, splashback, and walk-in-pantry
- Zoned ducted heating, and LED downlights throughout living areas
- Front contemporary Landscaping, fencing, and driveways all included
- Remote controlled lock up garage with internal access
Located conveniently on a quiet street in Clyde, this is the perfect location to call home.
Highly accessible and delivers easy access to the number of future and existing amenities:
- Shopping at Clyde
- Future railway station
- Selandra rise shopping center
- Casey fields,
- St Thomas the apostle primary school
- Selandra rise primary
- St Peters Secondary
!!CALL NOW on 0410 120 015 & BOOK YOUR VIEWING!!

Feel at home in Pasadena
Located in the popular Pasadena Estate and offering you convenient modern family living this quality built home will be sure to impress. Situated on a 387m2 allotment and just a stroll away from Casey Fields & Pasadena Shopping Centre this property would be perfect for the growing family or even the savvy investor. Features include:
- 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite & walk in robe
- 2 separate living zones
- Quality kitchen
- Double lock up garage with internal access & covered Alfresco area
Extra features include ducted heating, split system cooling & high ceilings. As one of the fastest developing suburbs in Melbourne this home offers its new owners a world of opportunity. Don't miss out and inspect today!

Description:
Titled Land- Hartleigh Estate
Located in the sought-after area of Clyde in the Hartleigh Estate, this block of land takes full advantage of its surroundings and boasts numerous benefits.
Opportunities to build your new dream home or investment are rare, so be quick to lock this titled beauty with great views to the wetlands.
16 Wynnstay Street is situated on a 444m2 corner block of land, approx. 16m frontage x 28m depth.
Positioned close to future and existing community facilities, architect designed town centre, medical centre, sports ground and schools, this area offers a range of opportunities, perfect to build your new dream home.
Hartleigh is situated in the heart of the fastest growing suburb of Clyde and is only moments away from central Cranbourne and Berwick. In the heart of the estate lies a beautiful park that not only provides a stunning outlook for neighbouring homes, but also encourages residents to gather together and enjoy the outdoors. Whether it's a picnic with friends and neighbours or just a quiet, twilight stroll while the kids run around the playground, Hartleigh is about building a new community.

Description:
Dont Wait To Build
Beautifully presented, light bright and lovingly cared for this 18month Arden home is the best for family living facing the park, on a corner with space for a caravan, boat or extra cars. 4 generous bedrooms, front master bedroom with walk-in robe and full en-suite with double vanities, family bathroom plus a theatre or study room. Large open plan kitchen with walk-in pantry, 900mm range cooker and dishwasher and family meals and dining area with slide stacking doors opening out to your decked alfresco and beautiful landscaped gardens. Features to note:
• High ceilings and 8ft doors
• Stone benches
• Timber floors
• Plantation shutters
• Internal access
• Ducted heating
• Split system cooling
• Shed and sliding gates for off road parking
Sensational location close to Clyde Recreation Reserve, Shopping on Clyde, Casey Football Ground, St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary School and public transport.

Description:
UNBELIEVABLE VALUE - BRAND NEW (Never lived in) Eliston Estate - Move In Now!
Situated in the new Eliston Estate Clyde is this brand new home (NEVER LIVED IN) that has been fully finished off for you to move in right away. *** If you are a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG. ***
The last bit of painting & landscaping have just been completed for this impressive home to offer you:
* Three good sized bedrooms, master bedroom complete with ensuite.
* HUGE open planned main family & meals living area.
* Galley styled kitchen that offers stone bench tops, plenty of cupboard & bench space, S/S appliances with a bonus upright 900m cooker & a bonus dishwasher.
* Landscaped front & rear yards low maintenance gardens.
Further completed by ducted heating, evaporative cooling, stone tops continued to the ensuite & main bathroom, blinds/curtains installed, timber look flooring, internal garage access, remote double garage, lots more upgrades & much more...
*Appliances will be installed before settlement.
A perfect choice for any new investors to the market with a strong rental demand in Clyde or first home buyers or downsizes looking to buy locally with not having to go through a long building process..
*** If you are a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG. ***
Approx. rental per week would be around the $370pw mark.
Save $$$ money on building here & move in right away...
*** Directions *** Turn into Eliston Avenue from Pattersons Rd, head right down the end of Eliston Avenue until Swanston Street, turn right into Swanston Street. Head right to the end of Swanston Street and Tin Alley Avenue runs off Swanston Street on the left.
You property address can also be found on "apple maps" if you are on Iphone user. ***

Description:
Contemporary Abode With Parkland Views
Positioned in the picturesque Belmond On Clyde Estate, this contemporary family home will win over every member for the family. Ready for you to simply move in, unpack and start enjoying the wonderful locale including great schools, convenient shopping precincts, loads of parklands, recreation spaces, sporting amenities and Casey RACE plus easy access to the South Gippsland Highway.
A modern facade with landscaped gardens creates a great first impression which is continued inside by the crisp white interiors, lovely timber style flooring and modern downlights. The stylish kitchen and walk in pantry, featuring stone benchtops, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, underslung sink and casual breakfast bar, overlook the open plan meals and living area. A second separate living area allows for zoned living and entertaining perfect for families with kids of all ages.
Also on offer are three comfortable bedrooms; a master bedroom with walk in robe and private ensuite plus two robed bedrooms that share the family bathroom and separate WC. A fantastic list of inclusions complete this impeccable home including high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuuming, intercom, alarm system and single garage with room for a second tandem parking space.
Perfect for busy families and tenants alike, is the landscaped yet low maintenance backyard with rear pergola and open air timber deck for outdoor dining. When the kids or pets need to stretch their legs there is plenty of extra open space just across the road at Bona Vista Rise Playground and Hilltop Parkland.
Call us today for a tour of this brilliant family abode!

Description:
A True Family Home Designed with Comfort and Practicality in Mind for All
CLYDE- 14 Hill Farm Drive,
Beautifully tiled throughout, this light filled home embraces an open plan living and meals area which will bring the family together, whether you are utilising the spacious kitchen with modern stainless steel appliances and a 900mm oven with rangehood, or taking advantage of relaxing on the couch in the family room.
With a formal dining area that overlooks a good sized alfresco, entertaining is made seamless and carefree. The backyard is easy maintenance greenery and perfect to run around in.
Intuitive to the needs of a family, this stunning home offers a second living area, which can be be used as a quiet area for relaxation, or as a space for daily family life to spread out into.
The large master bedroom is equipped with a walk in robe and full private ensuite, with full windows letting in plenty of natural light. The remaining 3 bedrooms are well proportioned and feature built in robes. The family bathroom is equipped with a separate shower and bath and has quality tiles throughout.
Packed with perks of a modern built home, 14 Hill Farm Drive also has a double garage with internal access, ducted vacuum, walk in pantry and evaporative cooling.
Features include:
- Stone bench tops
- Quality tiles
- Alfresco
- Ducted heating
- Two living areas
- Master with walk in robe and ensuite
- Double garage with internal access
Clyde is located only a short drive from freeway access and all amenities in the townships of Berwick and Cranbourne. The area is surrounded by multiple shopping centres. The town centre of Clyde offers a general store, post office and a community hall. Schools in the area include Clyde Primary, Hillcrest Christian College.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and vendor expectations. You can view with confidence that vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS

Description:
When Style Meets Practicality
This one and half year young home is an absolute beauty with an array of stunning features and a design which is perfect for modern family living. With gorgeous street appeal and perfectly manicured gardens at the front of the home you will immediately fall in love even before to step inside.
Making your way through the extended front door the first thing that will catch your eye is the impressive formal entry with recessed wall features and overall brightness that this home offers.
The heart of the home is without doubt the openly designed family, kitchen and dining areas which will be focal point for evening family gatherings and hosting friends during dinner nights.
Additionally the stunning residence boasts a formal lounge area or theatre room with acoustic batts in walls meaning that movie night will be at your place every time, 4 good sized bedrooms including a master suite with full en suite with his and hers vanities, heated towel rack, shower niche and huge walk in robe. At the rear of the home you will find the central family bathroom and separate toilet which are conveniently alongside the remaining bedrooms which all include built in cupboards.
All year round you will appreciate the rear alfresco which also fully opens up to the family area through 2 sets of double sliding doors meaning summer barbequing will never be better as well as maintained lawns and gardens giving your kids room to play in.
With a crazy amount of features including double glazed windows, central cooling and heating throughout, upgraded 900mm cooking appliances in kitchen as well as stone benchtops, soft close cabinetry and concealed handles, walk in pantry and significant storage throughout, solar hot water and 6 star energy rated efficiency, this home is everything that a new place should be.
Do not wait another minute as you may not find another one like this. Arrange to inspect before it is too late!
Contact: Neb Delibasic on 0411 332 467
Insights: 27 Abundance Circuit, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2019 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.
